title: The Man Who Was Killed Four Times

infobox.Title:: The Man Who Was Killed Four Times
infobox.Japanese title:: 四回殺された男  (Yonkai Korosareta Otoko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Sango Yokomizo
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Akio Otsuka as Sango Yokomizo  Shin Aomori as Taiji Komiyama  Makoto Ataka as Kengo Katsumata  Hisao Egawa as Haruyuki Hoshino  Misa Watanabe as Yumiko Niikura  Tomomichi Nishimura as Hideo Tsuda  Minoru Inaba as Chief  Yumi Nakatani as Atsuko Komiyama  Wataru Takagi as Next Conan's Hint

sections.Situation: Kogoro is called to investigate a suspicious murder where three people admit to killing a man for hitting him on the head. His posture showed the death to be a heart attack. They are all actors in an actor studio, their boss was the manager.
sections.People:
- 55 years old
- Actor
- Victim (heart attack)
- 58 years old
- Actor
- Actor
- Actor
- Actress
- 36 years old
- Taiji's wife
- Shizuoka Prefectural Police superintendent
sections.Trivia: - The title of this episode pays homage to the mystery novel written by Yasuhiko Nishizawa, named The Man Who Died Seven Times.[N 1]
